name: Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club
japanese_name: 蓮ノ空女学院スクールアイドルクラブ
description: 105 = 250px 104 = 250px 103 = 250px  The Hasunosora Girls' High School Idol Club (蓮ノ空女学院スクールアイドルクラブ) is the collective name of 8 virtual school idols from Hasunosora Girls' High School that are a part of a smart phone application which was launched on April 15, 2023. They debuted with the song Dream Believers.
